sentence: straighten and move the yellow block to the rear right of the rightmost blue block
move the rearmost purple block to the top of the yellow block that was moved
straighten and move the blue block behind the purple block between the rearmost blue block and the initially moved yellow block
move the purple block in the right center side to the center left
move the leftmost purple block to the front of the yellow block
move the leftmost blue block to the right front corner of the workspace
